info.name: Scrolling Windows for Dueling Nexus (sample)
info.description: This fix adds scrollbars, transparency, and viewing space to various pop-up windows used on Dueling Nexus, and a few other things. Available for testing and feedback.
info.additionalInfo: This is a part of the Scrollbars project I'm working on with Skeletonxf. It's also a part of my Jaden and Yubel theme. Check out Skeletonxf's style here. This project, including this style, is licensed to Skeletonxf and Yubelious! under MIT license, regardless of the apparent license applicable to this page. For that legal low-down, click the link below. MIT license v1.1: merged "Scrolling graveyard/RFG for Dueling Nexus (sample)", "Scrolling deck box for Dueling Nexus (sample)", and "Scrolling game announce window". Adapted each style to support the merge and the other 2 compatible styles. Added transparency to many pop-up windows. Moved the options button. Coded in some aesthetic sizing to reduce the chances of scrollbars in the middle column during siding. Resized the phase buttons so they fit lower resolutions.
